Text: Had to reupload this, for some reason it was corrupted or something. Should be working now.
Because this is such a large torrent, I suggest that you download each .iso individually. That way, you'll be able to get a full dvd quicker. Once one is downlaoded, start the second one.

now I have a question, after I burn the discs I'm trying to rip all the episodes off of them so I can put them as .avi files on my computer.

what's the best program for this?

I tried Magic DVD Ripper, but they come out blurry

I tried Bitripper but they come out widescreen

and I tried a freware program called "Convert DVD to AVI" but the audio is unsynchronized with the video, and the file sizes are way too big

EDIT: I found a good program, and it rips the files VERY nicely, they are crystal clear, but now I have another issue... usually the dvdrips I download are about 175mb a piece, but mine 330mb for some reason, why is that? and how do I make them smaller?

the hell with it, I give up... everything I try turns out with a jumpy image or low audio.

I have a request Gngrlss, can u or anyone else who downloaded this, please upload all the episodes as .avi files?

I've tried but I just cannot seem to get good copies... :(

I assume you mean you usually download individual episodes that are 175 mb and you ripped the episodes from this and they are 330 mb? I imagine that is because you ripped them straight from the dvd so they are higher quality than a tv rip. You could probably re-rip them and tinker with the settings to make them lower quality and therefore smaller.
I'm not going to rip all these into individual .avi files. Someone else please feel free to do that. Why not just mount it and watch? Or burn to a dual layer dvd (if you can)

For anybody that's having a problem watching this great torrent I have a solution for you! 

Please download the VLC Media Player @ http://www.videolan.org/vlc/

Then install it & just open the VTS_02_0 Vob File on any of the disks to play any episode. BTW, you can even convert any episode using the VLC Media Player too!
